Sylvaneth (Age of Sigmar) [3,120pts]

  • **Pitched Battle** 2,000 (Order - Sylvaneth) [3,120pts]

    • Uncategorised

      • Awakened Wyldwood

        Categories: AWAKENED WYLDWOOD, SCENERY

        Unit Abilities: Overgrown Wilderness, Roused by Magic, Wyldwood


        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Overgrown Wilderness Models are not visible to each other in an imaginary straight line 1mm wide is drawn between the closest points on the two models crosses over more than 1" of an AWAKENED WYLDWOOD. This scenery rule does not apply if either model can fly.
        Roused by Magic In the hero phase, if a spell is successfully cast by a WIZARD wholly within 6" of an AWAKENED WYLDWOOD and not unbound, roll a dice for each unit within 1" of that AWAKENED WYLDWOOD which does not have the SYLVANETH keyword. On a 5+ that unit suffers D3 mortal wounds after that spells's effects have been resolved.
        Wyldwood At the end of the charge phase, roll a dice for each unit within 1" of an AWAKENED WYLDWOOD which does not have the SYLVANETH keyword. On a 6, that unit suffers D3 mortal wounds.

    • Leader [440pts]

      • Arch-Revenant [100pts]

        Selections: 2. Briar Sheath, 2. Greenwood Gladius, 3. The Vesperal Gem, 4. Lifewreath

        Categories: ARCH-REVENANT, FREE SPIRITS, HERO, ORDER, SYLVANETH, Leader

        Artefact: Briar Sheath, Greenwood Gladius, Lifewreath, The Vesperal Gem, Command Abilities: Call to Battle, Unit: Arch-Revenant, Unit Abilities: Champion of Kurnoth, Crescent Shield, Fly, Ultimate Sacrifice, Weapon: Revenant's Glaive, Zephyrspite's Tail Pincers


        Artefact Artefact Details Ref
        Briar Sheath Subtract 1 from hit rolls for attacks that target the bearer.
        Greenwood Gladius Pick 1 of the bearer's melee weapon. Add 2 to the Attacks characteristic of that weapon if the bearer made a charge move in the same turn.
        Lifewreath In you hero phase, roll a dice. On a 3+ you can heal D3 wounds allocated to each friendly SYLVANETH unit wholly within 10" of the bearer.
        The Vesperal Gem Once in each of your hero phases, when the bearer attempts to cast a spell from the Lore of the Deepwood, instead of making a casting roll you can say they are using the Vesperal Gem. If you do so, that spell is automatically cast (do not roll 2D6) and cannot be unbound. After the effect of that spell has been resolved, roll a dice. On a 1, the bearer suffers D3 mortal wounds.
        Command Abilities Command Ability Details Ref
        Call to Battle You can use this command ability at the start of the combat phase. If you do so, pick 1 friendly SYLVANETH unit wholly within 9" of a friendly model with this command ability, or wholly within 12" of a friendly model with this command ability that is your general. Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of that unit’s melee weapons in that combat phase. You cannot pick the same unit to benefit from this command ability more than once per combat phase.
        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave Ref
        Arch-Revenant 12"584+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Champion of Kurnoth Re-roll hit rolls of 1 for attacks made by friendly KURNOTH HUNTERS units while they are wholly within 12" of this model.
        Crescent Shield At the start of the combat phase, say whether this model is using their shield for protection or to steady their weapon. If they use their shield for protection, you can re-roll save rolls of 1 for attacks that target this model in that phase. If they use the shield to steady their weapon, you can re-roll hit rolls of 1 for attacks made with this model’s Revenant’s Glaive in that phase.
        Fly This unit can fly.
        Ultimate Sacrifice Once per battle, when you allocate a wound or mortal wound to this model, you can choose to negate it. If you do so, this model cannot fly or use its Zephyrspite’s Tail Pincers attack for the rest of the battle.
        Weapon TypeRangeAttacksTo HitTo WoundRendDamage Ref
        Revenant's Glaive Melee2"33+3+-22
        Zephyrspite's Tail Pincers Melee1"14+3+-D3

      • Spirit of Durthu [340pts]

        Selections: 3. Autumn's Ire, 3. Glamourweave, 3. The Vesperal Gem, 5. Crown of Fell Bowers

        Categories: HERO, MONSTER, SPIRIT OF DURTHU, ORDER, SYLVANETH, Leader, FREE SPIRITS, Behemoth

        Artefact: Autumn's Ire, Crown of Fell Bowers, Glamourweave, The Vesperal Gem, Damage Table: Wounds0, Wounds1, Wounds2, Wounds3, Wounds4, Wounds5, Unit: Spirit of Durthu, Unit Abilities: Champions of the Everqueen's Will, Groundshaking Stomp, Impale, Spirit Paths, Wrathful Guardian, Weapon: Guardian Sword, Massive Impaling Talons, Verdent Blast


        Artefact Artefact Details Ref
        Autumn's Ire Pick 1 of the bearer's melee weapons. You can re-roll hit and wound rolls of 1 for attacks made with that weapon while any wounds are allocated to the bearer.
        Crown of Fell Bowers At the start of the combat phase, pick 1 enemy unit within 6" of the bearer. You can re-roll wound rolls for attacks made by friendly SYLVANETH units that target that unit in that phase.
        Glamourweave Roll a dice each time you allocated a mortal wound to the bearer. On a 5+ that mortal wound is negated.
        The Vesperal Gem Once in each of your hero phases, when the bearer attempts to cast a spell from the Lore of the Deepwood, instead of making a casting roll you can say they are using the Vesperal Gem. If you do so, that spell is automatically cast (do not roll 2D6) and cannot be unbound. After the effect of that spell has been resolved, roll a dice. On a 1, the bearer suffers D3 mortal wounds.
        Damage Table Variable 1Variable 2Variable 3Variable 4 Ref
        Wounds0 Wounds SufferedMassive Impaling TalonsGuardian SwordVerdent Blast
        Wounds1 0-22+66
        Wounds2 3-42+D65
        Wounds3 5-73+D64
        Wounds4 8-93+D63
        Wounds5 10+4+D32
        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave Ref
        Spirit of Durthu 5"1293+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Champions of the Everqueen's Will Add 1 to the Bravery characteristic of friendly SYLVANETH units while they are wholly within 12" of any friendly models with this ability.
        Groundshaking Stomp At the start of the combat phase, pick 1 enemy unit within 3" of this model and roll a dice. On a 4+ that unit fights at the end of that combat phase, after the players have picked any other units to fight.
        Impale If the unmodified hit roll for an attack made with Massive Impaling Talons is 6, that attack inflicts D6 mortal wounds on the target and the attack sequence ends (do not make a wound or save roll).
        Spirit Paths At the start of your movement phase, if this model is wholly within 6" of a friendly AWAKENED WYLDWOOD, it can walk the spirit paths instead of making a normal move in that movement phase. If it does so, remove this model from the battlefield and set it up wholly within 6" of a different friendly AWAKENED WYLDWOOD and more than 9" from any enemy units.
        Wrathful Guardian Add 2 to the Attack characteristic of this model's Guardian Sword while this model is wholly within 8" of any friendly AWAKENED WYLDWOODS.
        Weapon TypeRangeAttacksTo HitTo WoundRendDamage Ref
        Guardian Sword Melee3"33+3+-2*
        Massive Impaling Talons Melee1"13+*-21
        Verdent Blast Missile15"*4+3+-1D3

    • Battleline [400pts]

      • Dryads [100pts]

        Selections: 10 Dryads [100pts]

        Categories: DRYADS, ORDER, SYLVANETH, FOREST FOLK, Battleline

        Unit: Dryads, Unit Abilities: Blessings of the Forest, Branch Nymph, Enrapturing Song, Impenetrable Thicket, Weapon: Wracking Talons


        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave Ref
        Dryads 7165+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Blessings of the Forest Subtract 1 from all hit rolls for attacks that target this unit if it is wholly within 6" of any friendly AWAKENED WYLDWOODS.
        Branch Nymph 1 model in this unit can be a Branch Nymph. Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of that model's Wracking Talons.
        Enrapturing Song At the start of your combat phase, pick 1 enemy unit within 3" of this unit. Add 1 to hit rolls for attacks made by this unit that target that enemy unit in that phase.
        Impenetrable Thicket Add 1 to save rolls for attacks that target this unit while it contains 10 or more models.

        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Shadestalker The leader of this unit is a Shadestalker. A Shadestalker makes 4 attacks rather than 3 with her Cruel Talons and Fangs.
        Unbridled Malice Subtract 1 from the Bravery characteristic of eneny units while they are within 3" of any friendly units with this ability. In addition, re-roll successful battleshock tests for enemy units while they are within 3" of any friendly units with this ability.

      • Tree-Revenants [80pts]

        Selections: 5 Tree-Revenants [80pts]

        Categories: TREE-REVENANTS, ORDER, SYLVANETH, NOBLE SPIRITS, Battleline

        Unit: Tree-Revenants, Unit Abilities: Martial Memories, Scion, Weapon: Enchanted Blade


        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave Ref
        Tree-Revenants 5"165+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Martial Memories Once per phase, you can re-roll 1 failed hit roll or 1 failed wound roll for an attack made by this unit, or 1 failed save roll for an attack that targets this unit, or 1 charge or run roll for this unit, or 1 battleshock test for this unit. You cannot use this ability to re-roll more than once dice for this unit in the same phase.
        Scion 1 model in this unit can be a Scion. Add 2 to the Attacks characteristic of that model’s Enchanted Blade. A Scion can be armed with a Protector Glaive instead of an Enchanted Blade.

    • Other [200pts]

      • Kurnoth Hunters [200pts]

        Selections: 3 Kurnoth Hunters [200pts]

        Categories: KURNOTH HUNTERS, ORDER, SYLVANETH, FREE SPIRITS, Other

        Unit: Kurnoth Hunters, Unit Abilities: Envoys of the Everqueen, Huntmaster, Tanglethorn Thicket, Trample Underfoot


        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave Ref
        Kurnoth Hunters 5"574+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Envoys of the Everqueen If a friendly SYLVANETH HERO uses a command ability, you can measure the range of that command ability from a friendly KURNOTH HUNTERS unit instead of the HERO. Battletome: Sylvaneth Errata, July 2018
        Huntmaster The leader of this unit is a Huntmaster. Add 1 to the result of any hit rolls for a Huntmaster’s attacks.
        Tanglethorn Thicket At the start of either player’s charge phase, Kurnoth Hunters can sprout a thick weave of thorned branches. Until the end of the turn, they cannot move except to pile in up to 1", but you can re-roll failed save rolls for them.
        Trample Underfoot At the end of the combat phase, pick an enemy unit and roll a dice for each Kurnoth Hunter from this unit that is within 1" of it. For each result of 4 or more, the enemy unit suffers a mortal wound.

        Artefact Artefact Details Ref
        Crown of Fell Bowers At the start of the combat phase, pick 1 enemy unit within 6" of the bearer. You can re-roll wound rolls for attacks made by friendly SYLVANETH units that target that unit in that phase.
        Lashvines Roll a dice each time a wound is inflicted by a melee weapon is allocated to the bearer and not negated. On a 6+ the attacking unit suffers on mortal wound.
        Wychwood Glaive Pick 1 of the bearer's melee weapons. Add 2 to the damage inflicted by that weapon for attacks that target a WIZARD.
        Battalion Abilities Battalion Ability Details Ref
        Deadly Chorus In your shooting phase, roll a dice for each enemy unit that is within 6" of 2 or more models from this battalion. On a 2+ that enemy unit suffers D3 mortal wounds.
        Command Abilities Command Ability Details Ref
        Heed the Spirit-song You can use this command ability in your hero phase. If you do so, pick 1 friendly model with this command ability. Until your next hero phase, you can re-roll save rolls of 1 for attacks that target friendly SYLVANETH units wholly within 12" of that model. Battletome: Sylvaneth 2019

        Arcane Bolt 5If successfully cast, pick an enemy unit within 18" of the caster that is visible to them. That unit suffers 1 mortal wound. If the casting roll was 10 or more, the unit suffers D3 mortal wounds instead.

        Mystic Shield 6If successfully cast, pick a friendly unit within 18" of the caster that is visible to them. Re-roll save rolls of 1 for that unit until your next hero phase.

    • Allegiance

      • Allegiance

        Selections: Allegiance: Sylvaneth

        Categories: Allegiance

        Battle Trait: Forest Spirits, Navigate Realmroots, Places of Power


        Battle Trait Battle Trait Details Ref
        Forest Spirits Instead of setting up a SYLVANETH unit on the battlefield, you can place it to one side and say it is set up in the hidden enclaves as a reserve unit. You can set up one reserve unit in the hidden enclaves for each unit you set up on the battlefield. At the end of your movement phase, you can set up one or more of the reserve units that are in the hidden enclaves on the battlefield wholly within 6" of an AWAKENED WYLDWOOD and more than 9" from any enemy units. Any reserve units that are not set up on the battlefield before the start of the fourth battle round are slain.
        Navigate Realmroots Instead of making a normal move in your movement phase, 1 friendly SYLVANETH unit wholly within 6" of an AWAKENED WYLDWOOD can navigate the realmroots. If it does so, remove that unit from the battlefield and then set it up again wholly within 6" of another AWAKENED WYLDWOOD and more than 9" from any enemy units.
        Places of Power After territories have been chosen but before armies are set up, you can pick 1 terrain feature on the battlefield that was not set up by your opponent as part of their army. Do not take battleshock tests for friendly SYLVANETH units while they are wholly within 6" of that terrain feature.

      • Allegiance

        Selections: Allegiance: Sylvaneth

        Categories: Allegiance

        Battle Trait: Forest Spirits, Navigate Realmroots, Places of Power


        Battle Trait Battle Trait Details Ref
        Forest Spirits Instead of setting up a SYLVANETH unit on the battlefield, you can place it to one side and say it is set up in the hidden enclaves as a reserve unit. You can set up one reserve unit in the hidden enclaves for each unit you set up on the battlefield. At the end of your movement phase, you can set up one or more of the reserve units that are in the hidden enclaves on the battlefield wholly within 6" of an AWAKENED WYLDWOOD and more than 9" from any enemy units. Any reserve units that are not set up on the battlefield before the start of the fourth battle round are slain.
        Navigate Realmroots Instead of making a normal move in your movement phase, 1 friendly SYLVANETH unit wholly within 6" of an AWAKENED WYLDWOOD can navigate the realmroots. If it does so, remove that unit from the battlefield and then set it up again wholly within 6" of another AWAKENED WYLDWOOD and more than 9" from any enemy units.
        Places of Power After territories have been chosen but before armies are set up, you can pick 1 terrain feature on the battlefield that was not set up by your opponent as part of their army. Do not take battleshock tests for friendly SYLVANETH units while they are wholly within 6" of that terrain feature.

    • Malign Sorcery [120pts]

      • Endless Spell: Horrorghast [60pts]

        Categories: ENDLESS SPELL, HORRORGHAST, SHYISH, Malign Sorcery

        Spell: Summon Horrorghast, Unit Abilities: Empowered by Shyish, Fly, Predatory, Prey on Fear


        Spell Casting ValueDescription Ref
        Summon Horrorghast 6If successfully cast, set up a Horrorghast model wholly within 12" of the caster.
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Empowered by Shyish If your battle is taking place in the Realm of Death, this model can move up to 12" instead of up to 9".
        Fly This unit can fly.
        Predatory A Horrorghast is a predatory endless spell. It can move up to 9" and can fly.
        Prey on Fear Subtract 1 from the Bravery characteristic of units while they are within 12" of this model. Subtract 2 instead from the Bravery characteristic of units while they are within 6" of this model.

      • Endless Spell: Ravenak's Gnashing Jaws [30pts]

        Categories: ENDLESS SPELL, GHUR, RAVENAK'S GNASHING JAWS, Malign Sorcery

        Spell: Summon Ravenak's Gnashing Jaws, Unit Abilities: Empowered by Ghur, Endless Appetite, Fly, Predatory, Ravening Hunger


        Spell Casting ValueDescription Ref
        Summon Ravenak's Gnashing Jaws 8If successfully cast, set up a Ravenak’s Gnashing Jaws model wholly within 6" of the caster.
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Empowered by Ghur If your battle is taking place in the Realm of Beasts, this model can move up to D6+12" instead of 12".
        Endless Appetite When this model is set up, the player who set it up can immediately make a move with it.
        Fly This unit can fly.
        Predatory Ravenak’s Gnashing Jaws is a predatory endless spell. It can move up to 12" and can fly.
        Ravening Hunger After this model has moved, each unit that has any models it passed across, and each other unit that is within 1" of it at the end of its move, suffers D3 mortal wounds. In addition, subtract 1 from the Bravery characteristic of each unit that each unit that has any models it passed across until the end of the battle round.

        Categories: Command Points

    • Scenery [100pts]

      • Scenery: Penumbral Engine [100pts]

        Categories: PENUMBRAL, PENUMBRAL ENGINE, SCENERY, STORMVAULT

        Unit Abilities: Deteriorating State, Repercussion of the Necroquake


        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Deteriorating State At the start of each battle round after the first, roll a dice. On a 1-4 nothing happens. On a 5 or 6 the function that currently applies to all PENUMBRAL terrain features is replaced with the other function (see ‘Repercussions of the Necroquake’).
        Repercussion of the Necroquake At the start of the first battle round, after determining who has the first turn, roll a dice and consult the table on the right to determine which function all PENUMBRA terrain features on the battlefield gain for the duration of the battle.

        1-3: Orrey of Obfuscation: Re-roll save rolls of 1 for attacks that target units wholly within 12" of any Penumbral terrain features.

        4-6: Orrey of Illumination: At the start of your hero phase, you receive 1 extra command point if any friendly HEROES are within 12" of any PENUMBRAL terrain features.
